an5.218:4.3: Appasannā nappasīdanti, pasannānañca ekaccānaṃ aññathattaṃ hoti, satthusāsanaṃ akataṃ hoti, pacchimā janatā diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjati, cittamassa nappasīdati.
an5.218:4.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā apāsādike.
an5.218:5.3: Appasannā pasīdanti, pasannānañca bhiyyobhāvo hoti, satthusāsanaṃ kataṃ hoti, pacchimā janatā diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjati, cittamassa pasīdati.
an5.218:5.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṃsā pāsādike”ti.
